text: usane kaha, "tum par to tumhaare rab kee or se naapaakee thop dee gaee hai aur prakop toot pada hai. kya tum mujhase un naamon ke lie jhagadate ho jo tumane aur tumhaare baap-daada ne rakh chhode hai, jinake lie allaah ne koee pramaan nahin utaara? achchha, to tum bhee prateeksha karo, main bhee tumhaare saath prateeksha karata hoon.
